alert.note: Alert for Powder River; Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:23PM MDT until July 03 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL POWDER RIVER AND SOUTHERN ROSEBUD COUNTIES... At 723 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles south of Ashland, or 40 miles west of Broadus, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Sonnette and Otter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
